CamposMedina]]</nowiki> - <nowiki>[[http://peru.flisol.net/media/tutorial/ubuntu/ubuntu_cicsees_2005.pdf|Ubuntu - Un GNU/Linux para todos]]</nowiki> (in Spanish), presented at the <nowiki>[[http://www.istplev.edu.pe/congreso/|CICSEES - 2005]]</nowiki>

* RobertStoffers - The Ubuntu Documentation Team <nowiki>[[attachment:UbuntuDocTeam.odp]]</nowiki> - An overview of the Ubuntu DocumentationTeam and a quick guide to contributing to the project

* RobertStoffers - Ubuntu Hoary Hedgehog 5.04 <nowiki>[[attachment:UbuntuPres.sxi]]</nowiki> - presentation about Ubuntu and HoaryHedgehog presented at Townsville Linux Users Group meeting, designed to inform members about Hoary and Ubuntu prior to SFD installfest.

* NicoVeenkamp - Linux and Ubuntu (<nowiki>[[attachment:linux_ubuntu_20051029_dutch.odp]]</nowiki>) - A dutch language presentation for our local Mensa meeting. I cobbled it together partly from some of the presentations here.

* JeromeGotangco - <nowiki>[[http://www.jsg.box.com.ph/Ubuntu_LinuxWorld_PH.odp|Ubuntu: A GNU/Linux Operating System for everyone]]</nowiki> (2005-09-16) - This talk was given during Linux World Philippines 2005 at the Dusit Hotel Nikko in Makati City. It is an introduction to Ubuntu, discussing the history, goals and philosophies. It also delved into the success factors that made Ubuntu the top Linux distribution choice in a short span of time. A day after Linux World, the talk was also given at the Ateneo Professional Schools to the Ateneo Information Technology Institute (AITI). The whole presentation was given using Edubuntu workstation. Also <nowiki>[[http://www.jsg.box.com.ph/Ubuntu_LinuxWorld_PH.pdf|PDF]]</nowiki> available.

* BenjaminMakoHill - <nowiki>[[http://mako.yukidoke.org/copyrighteous/freesoftware/20050318-00.html|Ubuntu and Debian talk]]</nowiki> given at CNEIS in Manizales, Colombia on 2005-03-17. The page contains links and source to talk notes and slides in both English and Spanish.

* JeromeGotangco - <nowiki>[[http://www.jsg.box.com.ph/SFI_ICT_Roadshow_2005_PH.sxi|Free and Open Source Software Trends and Issues]]</nowiki> (2005) - Invited by <nowiki>[[http://www.pcbuyersguide.com.ph/|PC Buyer's Guide Magazine Philippines]]</nowiki> to hold a series of talks of Open Source and Linux trends and issues. The roadshow covered 11 major Colleges and Universities in Metro Manila from August to October 2005. There are some references to Ubuntu, Edubuntu and the OpenCD Project

* DanielRobitaille - Free and Open Software, Linux, Debian and Ubuntu (<nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-talk-robitaille-06-10-2005.odp]]</nowiki>) - A slightly modified version of a talk I gave at my workplace on October 6th 2005.  The main goal of the presentation was to introduce FOSS in a historical context and as an introduction to the current Ubuntu project.

* MarkShuttleworth - Intro to Ubuntu <nowiki>[[attachment:introtoubuntu.odp]]</nowiki> - A brief introduction to Ubuntu, what our vision is and how we are setting out to achieve that. It's a bit terse, probably, but you may well be able to fill in the gaps

* MatthiasKlose and DanielHolbach - Ubuntu, Breezy Badger and insights into the Community  <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~dholbach/talks/Berlinux.odp|(Slides)]]</nowiki> - Matthias talked about the Ubuntu distribution in general, and I talked about the different teams, our vision as a whole and why it's nice to be with us. (NOTE: the talk is in German)
* DanielHolbach - talk about MOTU and what we do <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~dholbach/talks/MOTU-talk.odp|(Slides)]]</nowiki>.

* JeromeGotangco - '''Ubuntu, at the forefront of the Linux Desktop Revolution''' - presented during the <nowiki>[[http://www.creaweb.co.kr/oss/index.html|5th Software Insight Conference]]</nowiki> at the COEX in Seoul, Korea last December 2, 2005. This presentation gives an updated overview of the project as well as what's going to happen during the Dapper release cycle. The event also featured speakers from Xandros, Mozilla, OpenOffice.org, and W3C. '''ODP:''' <nowiki>[[attachment:Ubuntu_SW_Insight_2k5_KR.odp]]</nowiki> '''PDF:''' <nowiki>[[attachment:Ubuntu_SW_Insight_2k5_KR.pdf]]</nowiki>

* AndiDarmawan and AnandaPutra - Presentation about Ubuntu in general (<nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu_debconf2-03-12-2005_ID.odp]]</nowiki>) and Edubuntu in general (<nowiki>[[attachment:edubuntu_debconf2-03-12-2005_ID.odp]]</nowiki>) at <nowiki>[[http://www.debconf.vlsm.org|Debian Conference II]]</nowiki> at <nowiki>[[http://www.ui.ac.id|University of Indonesia]]</nowiki>, Depok, Indonesia last December 3, 2005.
